item.description:
SKETCH-STOMP ANNOUNCEMENT

WHEN: 2-3 hours starting at the posted time

THE SCENE:

THE CRAWL: We'll hike along our route, stopping 20-30 minutes at each site. We'll do about an hour of hiking in all. Depending upon the time of day and how long we are out there, we may stop for a coffee or lunch break.

WHERE TO MEET*: At the posted time, with 15 minutes leeway for late-comers.

DIRECTIONS: Best is to Google it or write me directly.

THINGS TO BRING WHICH ARE OFTEN FORGOTTEN:
Walking shoes, Paper towels, mosquito repellant, food, water

IF LOST: If you become lost getting there, call.

LAX: We meet at the time above. You have 30 minutes additional slack, after which we may leave to the painting site without you.

INCLEMENT WEATHER: It is up to you to determine if the weather makes painting untenable. Although, I will try to leave a message on my voice mail if I myself do not intend to be there.

Michael Emerald
617/968-0627
westpointusma@yahoo.com
item.name: SKETCH-STOMP: Framingham Callahan State Park
